references: Related: CF 261099. Repealing: Ord 85621, Ord 87089, Ord 87950, Ord 92517, Ord 93461.
summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to and prescribing fees for building, sign, heating installation, oil or gas burner, boiler or pressure vessel, and gas piping permits and for the examination of certain drawings and the furnishing of certain services and material; defining offenses and providing penalties; and repealing Ordinances 85621, 87089, 87950, 92517 and 93461 and all other ordinances or parts of ordinances in conflict herewith.
